name: Dropdown
description: Dropdown is used to select an item from a list of options.

options.label: options
options.title: An array of selectitems to display as the available options.

option-label.label: optionLabel
option-label.title: Property name or getter function to use as the label of an option.

option-value.label: optionValue
option-value.title: Property name or getter function to use as the value of an option, defaults to the option itself when not defined.

option-disabled.label: optionDisabled
option-disabled.title: Property name or getter function to use as the disabled flag of an option, defaults to false when not defined.

option-group-label.label: optionGroupLabel
option-group-label.title: Property name or getter function to use as the label of an option group.

option-group-children.label: optionGroupChildren
option-group-children.title: Property name or getter function that refers to the children options of option group.

scroll-height.label: scrollHeight
scroll-height.title: Height of the viewport, a scrollbar is defined if height of list exceeds this value.

filter.label: filter
filter.title: When specified, displays a filter input at header.

filter-placeholder.label: filterPlaceholder
filter-placeholder.title: Placeholder text to show when filter input is empty.

filter-locale.label: filterLocale
filter-locale.title: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

filter-match-mode.label: filterMatchMode
filter-match-mode.title: Defines the filtering algorithm to use when searching the options. Valid values are "contains" (default), "startsWith" and "endsWith"

filter-fields.label: filterFields
filter-fields.title: Fields used when filtering the options, defaults to optionLabel.

editable.label: editable
editable.title: When present, custom value instead of predefined options can be entered using the editable input field.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

invalid.label: invalid
invalid.title: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

variant.label: variant
variant.title: Specifies the input variant of the component.

data-key.label: dataKey
data-key.title: A property to uniquely identify an option.

show-clear.label: showClear
show-clear.title: When enabled, a clear icon is displayed to clear the value.

input-id.label: inputId
input-id.title: Identifier of the underlying input element.

input-style.label: inputStyle
input-style.title: Inline style of the input field.

input-class.label: inputClass
input-class.title: Style class of the input field.

input-props.label: inputProps
input-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement/HTMLSpanElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

panel-style.label: panelStyle
panel-style.title: Inline style of the overlay panel.

panel-class.label: panelClass
panel-class.title: Style class of the overlay panel.

panel-props.label: panelProps
panel-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to the overlay panel inside the component.

filter-input-props.label: filterInputProps
filter-input-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the filter input inside the component.

clear-icon-props.label: clearIconProps
clear-icon-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLElement to the clear icon inside the component.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached. Special keywords are 'body' for document body and 'self' for the element itself.

loading.label: loading
loading.title: Whether the multiselect is in loading state.

loading-icon.label: loadingIcon
loading-icon.title: Icon to display in loading state.

reset-filter-on-hide.label: resetFilterOnHide
reset-filter-on-hide.title: Clears the filter value when hiding the dropdown.

reset-filter-on-clear.label: resetFilterOnClear
reset-filter-on-clear.title: Clears the filter value when clicking on the clear icon.

virtual-scroller-options.label: virtualScrollerOptions
virtual-scroller-options.title: Whether to use the virtualScroller feature. The properties of VirtualScroller component can be used like an object in it.

auto-option-focus.label: autoOptionFocus
auto-option-focus.title: Whether to focus on the first visible or selected element when the overlay panel is shown.

auto-filter-focus.label: autoFilterFocus
auto-filter-focus.title: Whether to focus on the filter element when the overlay panel is shown.

select-on-focus.label: selectOnFocus
select-on-focus.title: When enabled, the focused option is selected.

filter-message.label: filterMessage
filter-message.title: Text to be displayed in hidden accessible field when filtering returns any results. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

selection-message.label: selectionMessage
selection-message.title: Text to be displayed in hidden accessible field when options are selected. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

empty-selection-message.label: emptySelectionMessage
empty-selection-message.title: Text to be displayed in hidden accessible field when any option is not selected. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

empty-filter-message.label: emptyFilterMessage
empty-filter-message.title: Text to display when filtering does not return any results. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

empty-message.label: emptyMessage
empty-message.title: Text to display when there are no options available. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

tabindex.label: tabindex
tabindex.title: Index of the element in tabbing order.

aria-label.label: aria-label
aria-label.title: Defines a string value that labels an interactive element.

aria-labelledby.label: aria-labelledby
aria-labelledby.title: Identifier of the underlying input element.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: value
slots.title: Custom content for the item's value

slots.name: indicator
slots.title: Custom content for the dropdown indicator

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component's header

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component's footer

slots.name: option
slots.title: Custom content for the item's option

slots.name: optiongroup
slots.title: Custom content for the item's optiongroup

slots.name: emptyfilter
slots.title: Custom content when there is no filtered data to display

slots.name: empty
slots.title: Custom content when there is no data to display

slots.name: content
slots.title: Custom content for the virtual scroller

slots.name: loader
slots.title: Custom content for the virtual scroller loader items

events.name: change
events.title: Callback to invoke on value change.

events.name: focus
events.title: Callback to invoke when component receives focus.

events.name: blur
events.title: Callback to invoke when component loses focus.

events.name: before-show
events.title: Callback to invoke before the overlay is shown.

events.name: before-hide
events.title: Callback to invoke before the overlay is hidden.

events.name: show
events.title: Callback to invoke when the overlay is shown.

events.name: hide
events.title: Callback to invoke when the overlay is hidden.

events.name: filter
events.title: Callback to invoke when the overlay is shown.
